thread.title: Paul Barnett
thread.title_full: Lucky Tackle Box reviewed by Paul Barnett

author: Paul Barnett
title: Paul Barnett
text: Had to add a promo to my first box. Emailed them and got prompt response from britni. She added the promo to my box and emailed me back in a very short time. I have not received a box yet but I am guessing with the great customer service the box should be great as well. Ty britni and Ltb staff keep up the great work
